basic_node.title: Transmittance and refraction by object parts
basic_node.description: Object parts transmitting portions of beam. Transmittance, building on refraction, being expressed by Bidirectional Transmittance Distribution Function (BTDF).
basic_node.references: [re1, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/8500511/, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; bigger portion of transmission and absorbtion of beam implies lower portion of beam being scattered.] [re1, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S0924271612000378, Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; bigger portion of transmission and absorbtion of beam implies lower portion of beam being scattered.] [re1, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-12352-3_18, p.415 Mutual influence of absorption; reflection and transmission: A + R + T = 1 with absorption coefficient A; reflection coefficient R; transmission coefficient T. Thus; bigger portion of transmission and absorbtion of beam implies lower portion of beam being scattered.] [sp40, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9127841/] [sp40, https://doi.org/10.14372/IEMEK.2017.12.1.43] [sp40, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-3-319-66787-4, p.448] [sp40, https://linkinghub.elsevier.com/retrieve/pii/S092427161630171X]
